title: Liv Relay MIPS & Liv Path MIPS go sub $55, extend coverage for roadies and MTBers
content:
Liv has introduced two new helmets, the Liv Relay MIPS for road riders and commuters, and the Liv Path MIPS for mountain bikers. Both offer extended rear coverage, MIPS rotational impact protection system, and have been awarded the top-level 5 STAR safety ranking from independent helmet testers, Virgina Tech. All features of a high-end helmet [â€¦]

The post Liv Relay MIPS & Liv Path MIPS go sub $55, extend coverage for roadies and MTBers appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
